dmca.title: Born-Again-Christian.Info Complains of Infringement (#1) by Lady Diana Portal
dmca.body:
[private]

Reply to: [private]@born-again-christian.info

14th Oct. 2003

Google, Inc.

Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043 USA

DMCA Complaint of Copyright Violations

I am the sole owner of the website born-again-christian.info which has had copyright material, authored by me, taken from it without permission and posted on websites listed in Google. Please remove all the infringing pages from your index immediately and kindly reply to [private] confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA.
Here follow details of the infringements:

Case 1:

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on our website at: http://www.born-again-christian.info/easter.message.htm

The Infringer's website is http://www.tagnet.org/angelco-op/ 
The infringing page appears here: 
http://www.tagnet.org/angelco-op/newsletters/2003-04-19.html
The search query that shows the infringing page: angel-co-op april 19 newsletters
Infringers Emails: IP: [private] Violator: [private]

Case 2:

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on our website at: http://www.born-again-christian.info/diana.htm Continued on: /di.htm

The infringing pages appear here:

http://ladydiana.portal.dk3.com/article.php?sid=1362 http://ladydiana.portal.dk3.com/print.php?sid=1362 
The search query that shows the infringing page: 
Princess Diana's Tragic Death the Truth

Infringer's Email: The website has no traceable contact address, even their WHOIS is blank. The last time I searched, six months ago, the website was registered in Turkey, and the domain was registered under the same name as their IP. The articles are posted as if by visitors to the site, but in fact are posted by the site owners themselves who hide behind a disclaimer at the bottom of the page. Probably all their website content is stolen from others just as our article was. The only address I could find on the whole site is: [private]

Statutory Declaration:

I [private] have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I declare*, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

*NOTE: I am a Christian missionary, God's Word specifically commands me NOT to swear, just let your yes be yes. (Holy Bible, James 5:12; 'But above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your nay, nay; last ye fall into condemnation.
